column3:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#23441](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23441) (fuzz: Differential fuzzing for ChaCha20Forward4064-Poly1305@bitco

Concept ACK on introducing more differential fuzzing

Ideas for further differential fuzzing:
* It would be nice to have differential fuzzing for `CRIPEMD160`, `CSHA1`, `CSHA256`, `CHash160` and `CHash256`: all which are used in `EvalScript`.
* Also, it would be nice to have differential fuzzing of `src/crypto/sha256.cpp` (internal implementation) vs `src/crypto/sha256_{avx2,shani,sse41,ss

If you include third party code, can you please add a comment that mentions
- Where this code comes from (https://github.com/floodyberry/poly1305-donna I think?)
- Author name
- Which license it is under
Thanks for the review I have made the necessary changes, and PR is ready for further review.
